name: Gravity runner (itch) (MiceOrMouses)
description:
In this week of forgetting about a game jam, remembering about it, and being too lazy to make something actually good, GRAVITY!

Gravity man... Uhm... Gravatron? Gravilectron? Names are hard... Well anyways, Gravitation boy must run through hoards of enemies to... Do something... I seriously did not prepare for this jam.
